name: Card Sharpshooter
description:
You are The Joker, descending into a dungeon to defeat all the other card suits, with only a pack of cards at your disposal. How deep can you go?

Card Sharpshooter is an arcade-y retro-style first-person shooter, defeat the enemies in each room to progress. 

CONTROLSWASDMOVE
Left Mouse ClickSHOOT
ESCAPEOPENS MENU

Casually jammed up in Godot over 6 weeks, started by me and passed on to John and Patrick

Other games in the jam loop:

  • John - A Battle of Wits
  • Patrick - Spooky Skeleton Party

Other credits:

  • Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
  • Some assets adapted from Kenney's 1-Bit Pack (https://kenney-assets.itch.io/1-bit-pack)
